QuestData.Title: Blind Them!
QuestData.Description: Horde sunwalkers! We saw one of their scouts patrolling by the oubliette not long before you arrived.$b$bI don't know how he got here but I can guarantee you he isn't alone. They never are.$b$bKill the sunwalker scout before he reports our position.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find the tauren scout? Our presence must be kept a secret. The horde can NOT know we are here.
QuestData.RewardText: Sunwalkers are not to be trusted. They are the most militant branch of the tauren armies within the horde.$b$BThank you for your help in this, $p. Please accept this token as a reward.
